Dear Cantera users,

I have been attempting to utilize the Konnov mechanism=
 for the
simulation of stagnation point flames.  So far, I have been unsucc=
essful
at getting the solution to converge past 20-30 grid points.  When
co=
nverting the mechanism, I had to declare several of the reactions as
duplic=
ates that Cantera flagged as errors.

Thanks to Bhupinder for sending out a=
 cti of this mechanism.  I tried it
out and it failed to load into Cantera =
due to these undeclared duplicate
reactions.  Is this a problem that only I=
 have faced, or did you also
find this error Bhupinder and Mateusz?

I have=
 attached the cti file that I had previously created for people to
try out.=
  I would appreciate feedback on others success or failure with
this mechan=
ism.  If another user has their own cti of the Konnov
mechanism that they h=
ave utilized successfully, could you please send it
to the Cantera list, or=
 myself?

Thanks,

Jeffrey M. Bergthorson
Postdoctoral Scholar in Aeronauti=
cs
California Institute of Technology
Pasadena, CA, 91106
626.395.4445 (pho=
ne)
jeffb@...

Hi,

I ran into this problem a =
few months back..I believe its a software
problem..the latest version of ca=
ntera / python does convert the files
when the transport file is included

=
I've converted the Konnov mechanism files for you and attached it..

Good l=
uck with everything.

Bhupinder
